amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act under the heading "Iraq Train and Equip Fund" may be used to procure or transfer man-portable air defense systems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds under the heading "Iraq Train and Equip Fund" to procure or transfer man-portable air defense systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Yoho.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
